source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is an aerial view of a city riverfront on a sunny day. A large drawbridge with several military tanks on it spans the water. In the background, modern buildings line the river, and a large splash is visible near the bank.

source_caption_data.final_caption: This is an aerial view of a city riverfront on a sunny day. A large drawbridge with several military tanks on it spans the water. In the background, modern buildings line the river, and a large splash is visible near the bank.
